1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Data source.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Source
6  ( ropsSource,  
7    -- * dee & dum
8    consDee, consDum,  
9    -- * empty
10    consEmpty, relmapEmpty,  
11    -- * source
12    consSource,  
13    -- * source-term
14    consSourceTerm, relmapSourceTerm,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax       as S
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data         as D
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core         as C
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base     as Rop
22
23
24-- | Implementation of relational operators.
25ropsSource :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
26ropsSource = Rop.ropList "source"
27    --         CONSTRUCTOR       USAGE                   ATTRIBUTE
28    [ Rop.rop  consDee         [ "dee"              O.&  "" ]
29    , Rop.rop  consDum         [ "dum"              O.&  "" ]
30    , Rop.rop  consEmpty       [ "empty /N ..."     O.&  "-term*" ]
31    , Rop.rop  consSource      [ "source P /N ..."  O.&  "-pattern -term*" ]
32    , Rop.rop  consSourceTerm  [ "source-term P R"  O.&  "-pattern -relmap/" ]
33    ]
34
35
36-- ----------------------  empty
37
38-- | __empty \/N ...__
39--
40--   Output an empty relation which has terms /\/N .../.
41--
42consEmpty :: C.RopCons c
43consEmpty med =
44    do ns <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
45       Right $ relmapEmpty med ns
46
47-- | Create @empty@ relmap.
48relmapEmpty :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
49relmapEmpty med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitEmpty
50
51-- | Create @empty@ relkit.
52relkitEmpty :: [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
53relkitEmpty ns _ = Right $ C.relkit he2 $ C.RelkitConst [] where
54    he2 = Just $ D.headFrom ns
55
56
57-- ----------------------  source
58
59-- | __source C \/N...__
60--
61--   Read relation with terms /\/N.../ from judges of /C/.
62--
63consSource :: C.RopCons c
64consSource med =
65  do pattern  <- Rop.getWord  med "-pattern"
66     terms    <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
67     Right $ C.relmapSource med pattern terms
68
69
70-- ----------------------  source-term
71
72-- | __source-term C R__
73consSourceTerm :: C.RopCons c
74consSourceTerm med =
75  do pat   <- Rop.getWord   med "-pattern"
76     rmap  <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
77     Right $ relmapSourceTerm med pat rmap
78
79-- | Create @source-term@ relmap.
80relmapSourceTerm :: C.Intmed c -> String -> O.Map (C.Relmap c)
81relmapSourceTerm med pat = C.relmapBinary med $ relkitSourceTerm pat
82
83-- | Create @source-term@ relkit.
84relkitSourceTerm :: String -> C.RelkitBinary c
85relkitSourceTerm pat (C.RelkitOutput he2 _) _ = Right kit3 where
86    kit3   = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitSource pat ns2
87    ns2    = D.getTermNames he2
88relkitSourceTerm _  _ _ = Right C.relkitNothing
89
90
91-- ----------------------  dee & dum
92
93-- | __dee__
94--
95--   Output the nullary full relation.
96--
97consDee :: C.RopCons c
98consDee med = Right $ C.relmapConst med D.reldee
99
100-- | __dum__
101--
102--   Output the nullary empty relation.
103--
104consDum :: C.RopCons c
105consDum med = Right $ C.relmapConst med D.reldum
106
